oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 17 lines per page, in black rubricated in red and framed within a red line.
According to the colophon (f. 57r), copy completed on 19 Ṣafar 1157 AH [April 3, 1744 AD].
MS Arab 281. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
